alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Essex County through 430 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Boxford, or near North Andover, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Lawrence, Haverhill, Methuen, Andover, Gloucester, North Andover, Danvers, Newburyport, Amesbury, Ipswich, Middleton, Salisbury, Georgetown, Boxford, Hamilton, Newbury, Groveland, Merrimac, Topsfield, and Rowley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
